item.title: Outside Danico Ironmonger, 30th November
item.description:
The manhole cover spins in the hole. It's rectangle. My 9 year old son just fell down the manhole. He is slightly injured but it could be fatal for a younger child or elderly person
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Winchester Road, Belsize Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The fat ox illegally parked bikes, 30th November
item.description:
These riders congregate in the fat ox restaurant always seen swigging bottles of beer and then riding their bikes that they park all over the pavement. They drop cigarette ends all over the pavement and also other items of litter. How has the council implemented parking charges adjacent to the local shops for car drivers yet these riders can park on pavements without implications they are a complete nuisance. In the area and the numbers need regulating.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Eden Park Avenue, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Behind Argo House on Stuart road between the footpath and entrance to car park, 30th November
item.description:
Our water meter cover has sunk following broken and sinking of the pavement around it. It is causing rain water ingress which if it freezes can cause damage to the meter and potential for water leaks. Been advised by Thames Water that this requires urgent repair by the Council as Brent Council has adopted the Stuart road and the public footpath and pavements around it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barrier left in street, 30th November
item.description:
Street barrier has been here since August. It is serving no purpose whatsoever. It has at times been pulled across the footpath. This is the second report that has been made about it. Remove it ASAP.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coltness Crescent, Abbey Wood
